release_notes:
- Version 2.1.0

- PVE and PVP profiles added
- Items tracker, track what you have and what you need
- Auto deduct items you have when completing quests
- Configurations for hideout Stations integrated with Items Tracker
- Mini items tracker to be used while gaming
- You can now remove quests from quest tree and tracking
- Map side panel quests now show - + buttons for objectives(shoot 10, hand over item,(...))
- Improved app usage for setups with more than one monitor
- Improved visibility for big monitors and high DPI
- Minor bug fixes
- Improved user experience and commodities
